seoDescription: I’ve won tech fairs, taught programming, developed smart systems, and currently study Cisco networking. Rodrigo Halsey – Full Stack Developer focused on practical solutions.

hero.title: Hi, I'm Rodrigo Halsey
hero.description: Full stack developer, passionate about engineering. I enjoy understanding how things work and creating solutions that optimize people's time.

jobs.title: Freelancer
jobs.subtitle: Personal
jobs.description: I create custom systems based on each client's needs, offering practical, efficient, and scalable solutions. I also develop personal projects to experiment, innovate, and stay up to date in the tech world.

jobs.title: G.A.M
jobs.subtitle: Developer for public institution
jobs.description: I participated as a developer in the creation of specific interfaces within a university project aimed at addressing a social issue for the autonomous departmental government of Cochabamba. My contribution included designing and implementing key parts of the system (backend and API control), working in a team under academic and real-world standards.

jobs.title: Development Lead at Stores Axcel
jobs.subtitle: Tiendas Axcel
jobs.description: I led the development team for the sales system of the electronics store Axcel.

projectsWork.title: Sales System | Stores Axcel
projectsWork.description: I developed key functionalities, led the team, managed the database in Supabase, and connected interfaces to the database.

projectsWork.title: Lugabiz
projectsWork.description: A community platform to discover and share everyday places in the city.

projectsWork.title: HomeMart
projectsWork.description: I designed and developed a digital catalog that simplifies product browsing and management, enhancing the shopping and search experience.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.name: Rodrigo Pacheco Halsey
aboutMe.firstParagraph: Hi! My name is Rodrigo Pacheco Halsey, i'm a commercial engineer and systems engineer. I enjoy creating systems that solve real problems and make an impact.
aboutMe.secondParagraph: Some of my achievements include winning tech fairs organized by Franz Tamayo University and working as a teaching assistant in Data Structures and Programming. I'm always seeking to improve my skills and explore new technologies.
aboutMe.thirtParagraph: I'm currently taking Cisco training to earn my CCNA certification and I'm in my fifth semester at university. I'm focused on growing as a developer by working on personal and collaborative projects. If you have an idea or project, I’d love to help you bring it to life!
